price: 80. Kaadu usuk warsitaah elle hiddootah yan maaluu kee xayloy kaak raqta nagrenno, kaadu usuk Qhiyaamah ayro dibuk nel amaate- le maaluu kee xaylok tu-aalle kalah.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

translations: and he will come to Us
